# A79 AI Library

A Python library for A79 AI functionality.

## Installation

```bash
pip install a79
```

## Usage

```python
from a79 import greet

# Use the greeting function
greeting = greet("World")
print(greeting)  # Output: Hello, World!
```

## Requirements

- Python 3.11
